definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
to lift a prohibition/to lift a ban

sentences.english: Then, in 1567, the ban on overseas trade was lifted.
sentences.chinese: 此后，在1567年，海外贸易的禁令解除。

sentences.english: Muller Martini is seeking damages and injunctive relief.
sentences.chinese: 穆勒马提尼是要求赔偿和禁令救济。

sentences.english: The bans only affect planned caesareans, not c-sections which are carried out for emergency reasons.
sentences.chinese: 该禁令只有计划的剖腹产，紧急的剖腹产不列。

sentences.english: Then Master Linton has forgot the first injunction of his uncle,' I observed: `he bid us keep on the Grange land, and here we are off at once.'
sentences.chinese: 那么林惇少爷已经忘了他舅舅的第一道禁令了。

sentences.english: But there are more powerful reasons to drop the embargo now.
sentences.chinese: 不过也有更多更充分立即撤销禁令的理由。

sentences.english: Ideals be damned for the President who vetoed the ban on partial-birth abortions.
sentences.chinese: 总统否决成型胎儿流产禁令才是其受反对的原因。

sentences.english: Aban might be misunderstood abroad, and not only in the Muslim world.
sentences.chinese: 禁令可能会在国外也被误解，而不仅是在穆斯林世界。

sentences.english: The Justice Department said it would ask for the injunction to be lifted, pending its appeal.
sentences.chinese: 司法部表示，会在上诉期间要求撤销这一禁令。

sentences.english: In this context they discussed the issue of the EU arms embargo against China.
sentences.chinese: 在此背景下，双方讨论了欧盟对华军售禁令问题。

sentences.english: This latest rare earth ban is just going to accelerate this trend.
sentences.chinese: 刚发出的这则“稀土禁令”只会加快这一趋势。

sentences.english: State senator Ted Lieu voted against the ban.
sentences.chinese: 加州参议员刘云平投票反对这一禁令。

sentences.english: Prohibitions under development and construction units have Duandun of crisis?
sentences.chinese: 禁令之下，开发建设单位是否有断顿之危？

sentences.english: The case precipitates the French Parliament's ban on all transfusions involving humans.
sentences.chinese: 案件促使法国议会颁布所有涉及人类输血的禁令。

sentences.english: Should Sex Bribery Be Punished Without Legal Approval?
sentences.chinese: 缺乏法律基础的反性贿赂禁令作用有多大？

sentences.english: The city's ordinance to ban airplanes from the city sky?
sentences.chinese: 飞机不得经市空得新禁令？

sentences.english: Vick fell foul of a Federal ban on dogfighting.
sentences.chinese: 维克触犯了关于不允许斗狗的一条联邦禁令。

definition: to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
to repeal (a law)/to put an end to/abolition/annulled
